summary: Steve Bellovin is retiring.  Here’s his retirement talk, reflecting on his career and what the cybersecurity field needs next.

summary: The latest hot topic discussion on Mastodon is Bluesky, and which platform is "better".  I have some slightly disjointed thoughts about all of it
title: Mastodon vs. Bluesky: It's not the battle you might think it is
